art_style_description:
STYLE:
Heavy black outlines around the entire character. Smooth, clean color fills. Clean subtle controlled gradients that emphasize volume

SHADING:
Smooth airbrushed shading with a glossy. Large highlight shapes.

COLOR:
Slightly saturated but realistic color palette. Liberal use of black. Midtones with clean shadows.

RENDERING:
Clean vector-like clarity. Polished, arcade-cabinet quality. Surfaces appear smooth, glossy, and dimensional. Clear readability from a distance.

NEGATIVE PROMPTS:
No realism, no detail, no film lighting, no grain, no painterly strokes, no noise, no soft pastel look, no watercolor effects, no 3D rendering, no photographic shading, no atmospheric colored lighting. No rim lighting. No muted or desaturated colors, no neon colors, no toy-like hues, no white border.
